body: One of the best doujin from this site
The art Is Splendid and the story is great, I didn't fap on this one but it really cuz it so sad and beautiful
This kind of art is gorgeous

johanneskrauser you are funny, hey lets enable real ppl to torture, kill and rape, no problem, but heavens forbid someone translates a fictional piece containing pedophile fantasies (while this is more hebephile (and therefore pretty natural) since she has pubes). even without starting the debate about if there is anything wrong with pedophilia, your reasoning clearly demonstrates fucked up morals or logic
Right, sad and beautiful.😘
There should be a seinen tag. This is like the fourth manga that has this seinen feeling and want to find more of these

In short:

Teacher: I dreamed that I fucked one of my students in a post-apocalyptic world.
Student: I think I had the same dream.

*Law and Order, Dream SVU theme starts*

Dream Police Officer: Mr. Teacher, we need you to accompany us to the police station ... Apparently someone has been making inappropriate political comments.

Teacher: Phew...

Wow, the TL boy is lecturing us in the 2nd to the last page about "illegal wars" but it's damn oK to translate PEDOPHILE manga. Ah Ok. you stupid hypocrite. Good thing you have your priorities straight you sick f*ck

i used to hate the lolicon gener

the city, submerged, feels like that of Chikyuu no Houkago by Yoshitomi Akihito. The melancholic tune as well.

Its not that i like loli or anything but since when were there so many self righteous pieces of shit on a hentai site.
